author: Hiroko Sato
classification: Austronesian, Malayo-Polynesian, Central-Eastern Malayo-Polynesian, Eastern Malayo-Polynesian, Oceanic, Western Oceanic, North New Guinea, Ngero-Vitiaz, Vitiaz, Southwest New Britain, Arawe-Pasismanua, Arawe, East Arawe

author: to think
glottocode: vɛhei (it seems...): Pa Elias a ɛ-mata vɛhei… 'Elias thinks...'; alɔna ɛmata vɛhei... 'I think...'

author: to fear
glottocode: usually takes a word for 'skin' as a subject: pu-nia malelen ki i  mɔtɔ 'He is scared of snake.' (lit. his skin fears a snake.)

author: to fear
glottocode: great fear; e.g. to be killed

author: to breathe
glottocode: Although it looks a direct possessed noun, it takes a subject prefix: ka-ɛsmaɔnɛ-k, 1sg.sbj-breath-1sg.poss. 'I breathe'

author: mother
glottocode: 'his mother'; ani 'my mother', ani nɔhɔm 'your mother',

author: father
glottocode: his father'; av? 'my father', tɔvɔm 'your father'

author: needle
glottocode: a special bone of flying fox

author: to open, uncover
glottocode: to uncover a leaf for cooking

author: wind
glottocode: during dry season from forests; anytime but usually early morning and it gets cold
